sentences: John Wort Hannam is a Canadian folk musician, from Fort Macleod, Alberta.
Themes which are central to his music include life in Western Canada, and the human experience as seen through the eyes of working folk.
Hannam was a full-time public school teacher until 2000.
He has performed at festivals in Canada, the United States, Great Britain and Australia and he appeared at the 2006 Smithsonian Folklife Festival in Washington, D.C..
